title: Mornings with Maria (New Episode)
overview: Veteran business journalist Maria Bartiromo brings her knowledge of the financial industry to this early show that features a roundtable of rotating industry experts alongside the host. Bartiromo and her guests discuss news stories -- domestic and international -- and other topics that are expected to impact the economy and markets that day. The show's intent is to give viewers a jump-start on making moves to get the most out of their investments.
